tool_description: Instantly provide the latest news and the latest information on Cameroon. It is the easier way to  get latest news about Cameroon.
name: Instant Cameroon News
title: Instant Cameroon News

api_list.name: Retrieve data
api_list.description: Endpoint, which you use to retrieve the data you need. This endpoint can accept some parameters like page, search key and data range

api_list.name: Home page
api_list.description: Home and Welcome page that introduces the API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instant-cameroon-news.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instant-cameroon-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://instant-cameroon-news.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instant-cameroon-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
